data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,735 believers in Hautes-Alpes to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 139,465 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,735 believers in Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,735 believers in Hautes-Alpes, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Berber, Kabyle people might believe through him.

Please, teach the 1,735 believers in Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Hautes-Alpes who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France has a population of 141,200.

We estimate Hautes-Alpes has 1,735 people who might know Jesus, 86,347 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 53,118 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Hautes-Alpes, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
